page.title: 15 GOVERNMENT
page.content: Cannock Chase District has a Labour controlled Council consisting of 14 Labour Councillors,13 Liberals, 6 Conservative Councillors. Cannock has a Conservative Member of Parliament, Mr Gerald Howarth. The Council offices are situated in a new 7 storey building in Beecroft Road built in 1980. However, the former Council House which is a pleasing mid-Georgian house is at the end of High Green in the centre of Cannock. This was once the house of Henry Cary a friend of Wordsworth and is now used as the administrative block for the Technical College. There is a new Social Services building which houses the D.H.S.S & the Unemployment Benefit Offices.
